source_text:
Andrew / CommScope LDF4-50A
Model: LDF4-50A
Type: cable
1/2" HELIAX foam dielectric coaxial cable, aluminum sheath
Impedance: 50 ohms
Velocity: 88.0%
Attenuation at 30 MHz: 0.2 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 50 MHz: 0.27 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 150 MHz: 0.51 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 220 MHz: 0.63 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 450 MHz: 0.93 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 512 MHz: 1.03 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 806 MHz: 1.3 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 900 MHz: 1.36 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 960 MHz: 1.43 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 1800 MHz: 2.0 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 1900 MHz: 2.07 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 2400 MHz: 2.37 dB/100ft

expected_json.description: 1/2" HELIAX foam dielectric coaxial cable, aluminum sheath
expected_json.notes: Industry standard 1/2" coax, good balance of loss and flexibility
